message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000.  I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm very interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $10,500?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,500 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
